Articles.Content:
Hi, does anyone know or remember when KSP's B-day was last year? I'm planning on making a KSP fan-made game, will it be OK as long as I keep the game free? Squad? Thanks.

Best regards,

IndieDev3D

KerbalKon was on November 30th last year, so I imagine it's sometime around then.

EDIT: KSP debuted on the Orbiter forums on June 24, 2011. (6-24-2011)

EDIT: and Harvester and co. had bean working on KSP for the last six months.

Edited September 6, 2013 by The Deep Space Kraken

KerbalKon was on November 30th last year, so I imagine it's sometime around then.

Thanks, I guess I'll just start development at around November-ish. By the way, big fan, please don't kill my kerbals!

...please don't kill my kerbals!...

I'll try not to!

I'll try not to!

Thanks! I appreciate it!

I like fan made thing, but the last fan made game I saw SQUAD wouldn't allow them to use names/title from the game, it was also a free game. I hope they let you.

Best of luck.
sqaud allowed but there was a problem with some stuff just rename it and give credit to squad
